DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To determine whether implantation intraocular lens ( IOL ) modify anterior aspheric surface result reduce spherical aberration improve contrast sensitivity cataract surgery . Design : Prospective , comparative , interventional case series . Methods : In intraindividual randomize prospective study 25 patient bilateral cataract , IOL modify anterior surface ( Tecnis Z9001 , AMO- Group 1 ) compare biconvex lens spherical surface ( ClariFlex® , AMO- Group 2 ) . Ocular aberration 5.0 mm pupil 6.0 mm pupil measure Hartmann-Shack aberrometer . Quality vision measure visual acuity contrast sensitivity mesopic photopic condition . All patient follow 3 month .

Studies demonstrate nearly linear decline image quality age , suggest significant increase optical aberration eye time . 8-9 Advances wavefront technology open new door measurement ocular aberration . 9-10 Also , technology allow development new type IOL design compensate positive spherical aberration cornea , one important aberration contribute visual deterioration pseudophakic eye . 11-14 Based finding , approach compensate increase spherical aberration old eye develop IOL introduces negative spherical aberration system . Such IOL , Tecnis Z9001® IOL ( Model Z9001 , Advanced Medical Optics , Santa Ana , CA ) , develop AMO . This polysiloxane foldable 3-piece IOL , anterior aspheric surface ( negative spherical aberration ) design decrease total amount ocular spherical aberration cataract surgery.7 The purpose determine whether implantation intraocular lens ( IOL ) modify anterior aspheric surface result reduce spherical aberration improve contrast sensitivity cataract surgery . Patients Methods This double-blind prospective randomize study include patient age-related cataract , indication exist ocular pathology , unsatisfactory correction glass less 2.50 diopter ( D ) topography cylinder . Patients offer opportunity part clinical trial would allocate cataract surgery implantation aspherical spherical IOL . Patients randomize receive Tecnis Z9001 aspheric IOL one eye ClariFlex spheric IOL fellow eye . To protect patient safety , first eye surgery , ask whether wish lens type implant second eye . Written inform consent obtain patient surgery study approve local ethic committee . Exclusion criterion previous ocular surgery , central endothelial cell count less 1800 cells/mm2 , glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg , amblyopic eye , retinal abnormality , diabetes mellitus , steroid immunosuppressive treatment , connective tissue disease . The selected lens use study Tecnis Z9001® ( Model Z9001 , Advanced Medical Optics , Santa Ana , CA ) ClariFlexTM ( Advanced medical Optics , Santa Ana , CA ) ( Table 1 ) . Eyes Group 1 ( n=25 ) receive Tecnis Z9001® ( Model Z9001 ) eye Group 2 ( n=25 ) receive ClariFlexTM ( Table 1 ) . The Holladay formula use calculate IOL power short axial length ( < 22.0 mm ) SRK/T formula use average axial length ( ≥ 22.0 mm ) . The A-constant use 119.1 Tecnis Z9001 IOL 118.0 ClariFlex IOL . Axial length measure IOL Master ( Carl Zeiss Meditec AG ) , target postoperative refractive error 0.0 . Preoperative postoperative evaluation include uncorrected distance visual acuity ( UCDVA ) , best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) , spherical equivalent ( SE ) , slitlamp biomicroscopy , applanation tonometry , fundus examination , B-scan biometry , specular microscope corneal topography . Topography perform patient use EyeSys unit ( Version 3.03 ; EyeSys Technologies , Houston , Texas ) . The corneal endothelial cell count also record eye ( noncontact specular microscope , NonCon Robo , Konan ) . The visual acuity measurement record logMAR UCDVA BCVA . Clinical data collect preoperatively 1 3 month postoperatively eye . All patient operate fashion surgeon . All patient receive topical anesthesia lidocaine 2 % gel surgery . A 2.75 mm self-sealing clear cornea incision make temporal side . Viscoelastic solution sodium hyaluronate 3 % chondroitin sulfate 4 % ( Viscoat® ) use reform stabilize surgical plane protect endothelium . A 5.00 5.25 mm continuous curvilinear capsulorhexis initially perform 26-gauge needle complete forceps . The nucleous remove without intraoperative complication posterior capsule rupture . Phacoemulsification perform use Infinite ( Alcon Surgical ) Sovereign machine ( Allergan Surgical ) . All IOLs insert capsular bag injector system . The viscoelastic material completely remove end procedure . No suture use case . After 1 week patient fellow eye operate . Postoperative medication include moxifloxacin ( Vigamox® ) gatifloxacin ( Zymar® ) 4 time day 2 week , 0.1 % diclofenaco sodium ( Voltaren ) 3 time day 4 week steroid ( Predfort ) eyedrops 4 time day 6 week . Postoperative follow-up 1 day , 1 3 month . Postoperative evaluation perform 1 day , 1 month , 3 month . At 1 month 3 month , visual acuity , refraction , contrast sensitivity ( CSV-1000 HGT , Vector Vision Inc. ) , wavefront analysis Zywave aberrometer ( Bauch & Lomb , Rochester , New York ) perform . Contrast sensitivity measure use CSV-1000 HGT test instrument ( Vector Vision Inc. ) , present translucent chart divide 4 cycle spatial frequency 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 cycle per degree ( cpd ) . The background illumination translucent chart depend room lighting ; rather , provide fluorescent luminance source instrument automatically calibrate 85 candelas/m2 . All measurement obtain mesopic ( 5 cd/m2 ) photopic ( 85 cd/m2 ) condition . Each cycle contain 17 round patch 1.5 inch diameter . The first patch high-contrast grate present sample . The test patch arrange 2 row 8 level contrast . The level decrease left right along row logarithmic fashion 0.17 log unit step 1 3 0.15 log unit step 3 8 . The examination perform unilaterally distance 2.5 best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) undilated pupil . All measurement conduct condition examiner unaware type IOL implant . Wavefront analysis perform Zywave aberrometer . The Zywave aberrometer use Hartmann-Shack method analysis outgo wavefront measure fifth-order Zernike aberration , include coma , trefoil , spherical aberration . For statistical analysis visual acuity , logarithm minimum angle resolution ( logMAR ) acuity value use . Similarly , record contrast sensitivity value transform log value describe Vector Vision . All data analysis perform use SPSSX statistical program ( SPSS Inc , Chicago , IL ) . The 2 IOLs compare eye intraindividually . The analysis base non-normal distribution data . The nonparametric Mann-Whitney U test use compare data 2 IOL group . A P value le 0.05 consider statistically significant .
DOC.criteria: Agerelated cataract No indication exist ocular pathology Unsatisfactory correction glass Less 2.50 diopter ( D ) topography cylinder .
